00013 #include "stkdefines.h"
00014 
00015 StkMainWindow::StkMainWindow(StkIf *stkIf, QWidget *parent) :
00016     QMainWindow(parent)
00017 {
00018     mStkIf = stkIf;
00019     // Store SimToolkit interface properties
00020     mStkProperties = new StkOfonoProperties(mStkIf);
00021     // Create a main menu as central widgt
00022     mStkMenu = new StkMenu(mStkProperties->mainMenuIcon(),mStkProperties->mainMenuTitle(),mStkProperties->mainMenuItems(),this);
00023     this->setCentralWidget(mStkMenu);
00024     this->setWindowTitle(mStkProperties->mainMenuTitle());
00025     this->setWindowIcon(QIcon(mStkProperties->mainMenuIcon()));
00026 
00027     // connect signals
00028     connect(mStkMenu, SIGNAL(itemSelected(uchar)), this, SLOT(responseOkWithSelection(uchar)));
00029     connect(mStkMenu, SIGNAL(goBack()), this, SLOT(close()));
00030     connect(mStkMenu, SIGNAL(endSession()), this, SLOT(close()));
00031 }
00032 
00033 void StkMainWindow::responseOkWithSelection(uchar selection)
00034 {
00035     QDBusObjectPath stkAgentPath(STK_AGENT_PATH);
00036     mStkIf->SelectItem(selection,stkAgentPath);
00037 }
